message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I can only pay up to $75. Thank you.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell it to you for $82.50. It's a fair price considering its value and quality.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I would like to counter with an offer of $80 for the product. I hope this works for you.
